content:
HL7 intends scheduling Birds of a Feather webinars on a “monthly basis” – similar to what we would normally have at our Working Group Meetings. The first Birds of a Feather webinar is scheduled for Monday, August 31, 4 PM EDT. This is a Member Advantage Webinar. Please forward to all members.

Members can register for this webinar at:
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/6844018288262247694

After registering, the member will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the webinar.

Webinar Description
This session will present an overview of the new HL7 FHIR registry, https://registry.fhir.org, which will soon be made available for use by HL7 International. The upgraded FHIR registry contains powerful new query features for the FHIR community to find any FHIR package, profile or resource for reuse or to inform standards development projects. The registry content is now based on the FHIR package registry, bringing together production-ready FHIR resources and packages from the core HL7 FHIR specification, HL7 published Implementation Guides and community FHIR content from Simplifier.net.

Presenter: Ward Weistra, Product Owner for Simplifier.net and Forge at Firely
Panelists: Grahame Grieve & Wayne Kubick

Sadhana Alangar
Director of Education
sadhana@hl7.org

:package: The new, package-based FHIR Registry is now live at https://registry.fhir.org! Learn more and provide your feedback in #tooling: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179239-tooling/topic/The.20new.2C.20package-based.20registry.2Efhir.2Eorg
